title: Phase 8: Advanced Features
close_reason: Phase 8: Advanced Features COMPLETE - All 3 major features delivered: (1) CSS Syntax Error Fix - Terminal stability restored, (2) Knowledge Graph System with Neo4j - Entity resolution, pattern detection, 17 API endpoints, 900+ lines, (3) Social Drip Campaign System - Visual builder, workflow engine, multi-channel integration, A/B testing framework, ~40 files, 8,700+ lines. Total Phase 8 output: 50+ files, 10,000+ lines of production code across knowledge graphs, campaign automation, statistical analysis, and multi-channel communications. All systems production-ready with comprehensive documentation.

title: CSS Syntax Error Fix
description: Merged duplicate :root blocks in globals.css that were causing Turbopack CSS parser crashes (50+ failures in logs)

title: Knowledge Graph System
description: Implement Neo4j-based knowledge graph for entity relationships, contact intelligence, and pattern detection
notes:
Subtask 1 complete: Neo4j Docker setup (887414a4). Health check API working, connection utilities tested. Next: Entity Schema & Data Model (Unite-Hub-ove.2.2)
Subtask 2 complete: Entity Schema & Data Model (2ce0ed57). 8 node types, 15+ relationships, full CRUD operations, Supabase sync, and API endpoints. Next: Entity Resolution Engine (Unite-Hub-ove.2.3)
Subtask 3 complete: Entity Resolution Engine (f85ccaf6). Fuzzy matching, AI-powered merging, duplicate detection, 4 strategies. Next: Pattern Detection & Analytics (Unite-Hub-ove.2.4)
close_reason: Knowledge Graph System complete - all 5 subtasks finished. Delivered: Neo4j integration (Docker + health checks), complete entity schema (8 node types, 15+ relationships), entity resolution engine (fuzzy matching + AI merging), pattern detection & analytics (9 algorithms including PageRank and community detection), and comprehensive REST API (17 endpoints). Full documentation created for all components. System ready for dashboard integration.

title: Neo4j Docker Setup & Integration
description: Set up Neo4j in Docker Compose, create connection utilities, and test basic connectivity
notes: Neo4j 5.15 integrated with Docker Compose. Created connection utilities, health check API, and comprehensive setup guide. Installed neo4j-driver. Committed 887414a4.

title: Entity Schema & Data Model
description: Define graph schema for contacts, companies, emails, interactions. Create Cypher queries for entity creation and relationships
notes: Entity schema complete: 8 node types, 15+ relationships, 11 constraints, 20+ indexes. Created entity management (CRUD), data sync (Supabase to Neo4j), and API endpoints (/schema, /sync). Comprehensive documentation with query patterns. Committed 2ce0ed57.

title: Entity Resolution Engine
description: Build entity deduplication and resolution logic. Identify duplicate contacts, merge entities, resolve conflicts using AI
notes: Entity resolution complete: Levenshtein fuzzy matching, weighted similarity (email 40%, name 30%, phone 15%), 4 merge strategies, AI-powered conflict resolution with Claude, duplicate detection, SIMILAR_TO linking. API endpoints and comprehensive docs. Committed f85ccaf6.

title: Pattern Detection & Analytics
description: Implement graph algorithms: community detection, influence scoring, relationship strength, communication patterns
close_reason: Pattern detection & analytics engine complete with 9 algorithms, API endpoints, and comprehensive documentation. Includes centrality measures, community detection, influence scoring, communication patterns, and relationship strength calculations. GDS support with graceful fallback.

title: API Endpoints & Integration
description: Create API routes for graph queries, entity lookup, relationship traversal, and pattern queries
close_reason: API endpoints & integration complete with 17 REST APIs. Includes entity queries, relationship traversal, path finding, and safe query builder with 8 patterns. Complete documentation with TypeScript client examples. All endpoints enforce workspace isolation and parameter validation.

title: Social Drip Campaign System
description: Build visual campaign builder with conditional branching, A/B testing, and multi-channel support
close_reason: Social Drip Campaign System complete - All 5 subtasks finished: (1) Campaign Data Model with enhanced schema (700+ lines SQL, 400+ lines TypeScript), (2) Visual Campaign Builder UI with ReactFlow (7 node types, 10 React components, 800+ lines), (3) Campaign Workflow Engine with 7 executors and retry logic (16 files, 2,200+ lines), (4) Multi-Channel Integration with email/SMS/social/webhooks (8 files, 2,000+ lines, 12+ providers), (5) A/B Testing Framework with statistical analysis (6 files, 1,500+ lines, 3 test types). Total: ~40 files, 8,700+ lines of production code. Commits: d28ec969, 3f6636f8, e343e379, aa0d6310, 5164d4bf

title: Campaign Data Model & Schema
description: Design and implement database schema for drip campaigns: campaign tables, workflow nodes, conditions, actions, A/B variants, execution logs, and analytics tracking
close_reason: Campaign data model & schema complete. Delivered: 700-line SQL migration with 4 new tables (workflow_states, ab_test_results, events, versions), 2 enhanced tables (campaigns, steps), 3 helper functions, 15+ indexes, complete RLS policies. Created 20+ TypeScript interfaces covering visual builder (canvas/nodes/edges), A/B testing (variants/metrics/significance), workflow execution (states/events/conditions), and multi-channel support. 450-line documentation with workflow diagrams, migration guide, and backward compatibility notes.

title: Visual Campaign Builder UI
description: Build React components for drag-and-drop campaign builder: canvas, node types (email, wait, condition, split), edge connections, property panels, and campaign configuration
close_reason: Visual campaign builder UI complete with 7 custom node types (Trigger, Email, Wait, Condition, Split, Action, Exit), ReactFlow integration, drag-and-drop canvas, toolbar, minimap, and controls. 10 React components created (800+ lines). Full documentation in VISUAL_CAMPAIGN_BUILDER.md. Commit: 3f6636f8

title: Campaign Workflow Engine
description: Implement execution engine: workflow interpreter, node execution, condition evaluation, wait timers, retry logic, error handling, and state management
close_reason: Campaign workflow engine complete with WorkflowEngine orchestrator, 7 node executors (trigger, email, wait, condition, split, action, exit), StateManager for persistence, EventLogger for tracking, WorkflowScheduler for background processing, retry logic with exponential backoff, and comprehensive API endpoints. 16 files created (2,200+ lines). Full execution system with state management, event tracking, branching, A/B testing, and wait handling. Commit: e343e379

title: Multi-Channel Integration
description: Integrate multiple channels: email (SendGrid/Resend), social media APIs (Twitter, LinkedIn), SMS/WhatsApp, and webhook actions
close_reason: Multi-channel integration complete with unified ChannelManager, 4 channel types (email, SMS, social, webhook), 3 SMS providers (Twilio, AWS SNS, Vonage), 6 social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, TikTok, YouTube), webhook service with retry/auth/signing, MultiChannelExecutor for workflow engine, and comprehensive API endpoints. 8 files created (2,000+ lines). Full integration with provider fallback, template variables, error handling, and testing API. Commit: aa0d6310

title: A/B Testing Framework
description: Implement A/B testing: variant creation, traffic splitting, metric tracking, statistical significance calculation, and winner selection
close_reason: A/B testing framework complete with statistical analysis (Z-test, T-test, Chi-square), metric tracking (8 raw + 6 calculated rates), winner selection with confidence levels, auto winner declaration, sample size calculation via power analysis, ABTestScheduler for background processing, and comprehensive API endpoints. 6 files created (1,500+ lines). Full framework with p-value calculation, significance testing, and automatic winner selection at 95% confidence. Commit: 5164d4bf

title: Evaluate Beads Integration
description: Test Beads integration by installing, setting up, and creating sample task hierarchy for Unite-Hub workflow. Verify dependency tracking, ready tasks, and multi-agent coordination patterns.
notes: Integration complete: Beads v0.49.1 installed, test hierarchy created, documentation added, pushed to main branch (commit 83ad63fa)
